description: Numbers n such that 86^n - 85^n is prime.
comments: Terms greater than 1000 are often only strong pseudoprimes.All terms are prime. - _Robert Price_, Apr 14 2014a(8) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Apr 14 2015
author: _Mike Oakes_, May 18 2001, May 19 2001
extensions: a(7) from _Robert Price_ (computer run by Adam Marciniec), Apr 14 2015
